page.title: 12Care Of The Elderly
page.content: Bryn Dar Homes is a home for mentally handicapped children.Most of the children there can walk so there are very few children in wheel_chairs.Bryn Dar is quite a large building but there aren't a lot of children living there.They have had good results from Bryn Dar.Las summer a boy of 18 years of age left Bryn Dar to become an apprentice for an engineer in England. For the enjoyment of the little children,at the back of Bryn Dar there is a playground with swings and a roundabout.I was talking to a little girl who lived there,she was going home and she said she loved Bryn Dar.
